scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend --prefix-colors cyan,magenta "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && bash -lc 'if [ -x venv/bin/uvicorn ]; then venv/bin/uvicorn app.main:app --reload; elif [ -x venv/bin/python ]; then venv/bin/python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload; else uvicorn app.main:app --reload; fi'
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && bash -lc 'if [ -x venv/bin/ruff ]; then venv/bin/ruff check app tests; else ruff check app tests; fi'
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && bash -lc 'if [ -x venv/bin/ruff ]; then venv/bin/ruff format app tests && venv/bin/ruff check --fix app tests; else ruff format app tests && ruff check --fix app tests; fi'
